Code: EXEC SQL SELECT TIPREG, NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, OCORHIST, OPERACAO, DTMOVTO, HORAOPER, NOMFAV, SITCONTB, SITUACAO, CODUSU, LIMCRR, TIPFAV, DATNEG, FONPAG, CODPSVI, CODSVI, NUMOPG, NUMREC, MOVPCS, COD_EMPRESA, TIMESTAMP, VAL_OPERACAO, COD_PRODUTO, NUM_APOLICE, NOM_PROGRAMA, T2.DES_OPERACAO, T2.DES_ABREVIADA, T2.FUNCAO_OPERACAO FROM seguros.v0histsini WHERE T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND T1.SITUACAO = '0' AND T1.OPERACAO = T2.COD_OPERACAO AND T2.IDE_SISTEMA = 'SI' AND T2.FUNCAO_OPERACAO IN ('PRE','JPIND','JPDP') AND T2.COD_OPERACAO NOT IN (1170,1171,1172,1173,1174,1175) END SQL
